  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 3000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c and Shader Model 3.0，at least 512MB
  • Storage: 3300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.2Ghz+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The Framerate may drop when lots of enemies are on screen.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Any Dual Core 2Ghz+
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
